channel.description: Recent content in startup on Hi, I'm Xuan

item.title: Lessons from a startup that translated into Big Tech
item.description: Our startup at an offsite where we graffitied a wall in SF Before joining Lyft, I worked at a YC startup for several years in Business Development, Growth, and Product Marketing roles. I was employee #18 when I joined and we eventually grew to ~40 people before being acquired by Lyft in 2017. We built a good product with millions of app installs, but we never found a path to becoming a billion-dollar business.
